posts.post_content:
Nice group of T206 HOF's for sale. Working on a little project and these are dupes for me. Amount shown is the delivered insured price. 
Please email me with any interest. They will take priority over all pm's and post's. Paypal A-Okay with no extra fee. Thanks all, Tony

ps- *ALL CARDS ARE GUARANTEED TO GRADE NUMERICALLY*

[url]andreatny@q.com[/url]

Addie Joss portrait - Jumbo size card. Light chipping bottom border. From the Beantown find- $110 (SOLD)
Nap Lajoie portrait - Teeny upper left corner crease- $180 (SOLD)
Elmer Flick - Light crease on his right shoulder running upward. Very hard to see and you really need to feel for it- SOLD 
Rube Marquard portrait - Light paper rub on reverse in the word Piedmont. From the Beantown find- $90 (SOLD)
Mordecai Brown Chicago on shirt - Crease in Cubs on his chest. From the Beantown find- $105 (SOLD)
Chief Bender portrait - Very light crease about 3rd button high across his chest- $95 (SOLD)
I'll take Joss and Marquard.  Email sent.

Only Flick remains. If anyone wants him at the $75 price shown I'll throw in the Herzog card below for free. 
Buck has a little surface wrinkle in between his buttons that runs about half way in from the left side. 
It's very hard to see. Again please email me if interested. Thank you, Tony

[url]andreatny@q.com[/url]

**SOLD**
Bump. I have attached a better scan of both cards below. Take the pair for $75 delivered. Again both have a light crease that is hard to see.
Both will grade numerically guaranteed. Let's call em' Good + to VG. Please let me know if interested. Paypal A-Okay with no extra fee. 
Thx, Tony
[url]andreatny@q.com[/url]

[IMG]http://i9.photobucket.com/albums/a95/andreatny/herzogflickfront.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i9.photobucket.com/albums/a95/andreatny/herzogflickback.jpg[/IMG]
I'll take them if you still have them.

There yours. PM coming.....

         Thank you,
